The entire backstory is so...I like it so much. Loyalty through generations....damn. The Princess seemed so lovely though and I'm happy she found her happiness. Nino and his father - I'm glad they found a way to be happy with their mission as well. And Abed, he's a real one lol. Even though he had to manipulate a couple people, he's doing his job and pursuing his happiness as well.
